sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from "react"; import DeleteButton from "./DeleteButton"; const StockTableRow = ({ stock, averageData, onDelete }) => { const billion = 1000000000 const average = averageData[0] const [show, setShow] = useState(false) return( setShow(true)} onMouseLeave={()=> setShow(false)}> { stock.ticker } { stock.companyName } { stock.sector } { stock.currentPrice } =average.marketCap) ? 'above-average':'below-average'}>{ (stock.marketCap /billion).toFixed(2) } =average.enterpriseValue) ? 'above-average':'below-average'}>{ (stock.enterpriseValue /billion).toFixed(2) } { (stock.forwardPE).toFixed(2) } =average.enterpriseToRev) ? 'above-average':'below-average'}>{ (stock.enterpriseToRev).toFixed(2) } =average.enterpriseToEbitda) ? 'above-average':'below-average'}>{ (stock.enterpriseToEbitda).toFixed(2) } =average.profitMargins) ? 'above-average':'below-average'}>{ (stock.profitMargins).toFixed(3) } =average.roe) ? 'above-average':'below-average'}>{ (stock.roe).toFixed(2) } ) } export default StockTableRow
